mapper.select: SELECT yb.pibCode ,yb.hospitalId ,yb.patientId ,yb.piName ,yb.piCode ,yb.pivName ,yb.piBalance ,yb.pDoctor ,yb.piDate ,yb.adminId ,yb.pirDate ,pit.pName FROM yebang yb JOIN patient pit ON yb.hospitalId = pit.hospitalId AND yb.patientId = pit.patientId WHERE yb.patientId = 'patientId01'
